text: @joshtpm @realDonaldTrump  Settle down Chubs. There was no COVID-19 or COVID-19 tests in 2016 let alone "obsolete" ones for you to inherit, like you inherited his 7 year long "Bull" stock market ... which you've now trashed with your incompetence. https://t.co/5BD5ELw6W1

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
